function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of COVID-19 in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation and filtration systems, implementing engineering control measures","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filters, UV cleaners, photocatalytic oxidation","People":"Occupants of indoor environments, general public","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Limitations of increasing ventilation in winter","Impact":"Challenges in increasing ventilation without compromising thermal comfort and energy use","Mitigation":"Exploring alternative engineering control measures, optimizing existing ventilation systems","Technologies":"Improved filtration systems, energy-efficient ventilation systems","People":"Occupants of indoor environments, general public","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Incomplete understanding of COVID-19 transmission mechanisms","Impact":"Lack of full understanding impedes the ability to completely eliminate the risk of infection","Mitigation":"Continued research and monitoring, implementation of flexible and adaptable mitigation strategies","Technologies":"Research and monitoring tools, adaptive ventilation systems","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
